answers.answer: I hope this is resolved for you ..... I get the exact same feelings with bad attacks - it takes me days to weeks to feel normal - *****.Mine is related to my adrenal glands - I hurt them when we couldn't get my "asthma" (still in the air for the proper diagnosis - doesnt behave like it should) under control and I was on large amounts of inhaled steroids and prednisone.  Now I know when stressed I sleep as much as possible (boss hates it), add extra vitamins and salt.  It takes a week or so but I can get it to bounce back.I would talk to your doctor - they may want to do some blood tests and make sure everything is alright.  If it comes back normal I would suggest talking to a naturopath, that is who helped me understand the adrenal fatigue and figured out my allergies as well. good luck!
